FROM board_mst b
JOIN user_mst u ON b.userIndex = u.userIndex
LEFT JOIN reply_mst r ON b.boardIndex = r.boardIndex
where b.boardIndex = #{boardIndex}

SELECT b.boardIndex, b.boardSubject, u.userIndex, u.userId, u.userNick, b.boardRegDate, b.boardVisit, b.boardUploadName, b.boardUploadSize, b.boardUploadLocation, COUNT(r.replyIndex) AS replyCount,b.boardLikeCount
FROM board_mst b
JOIN user_mst u ON b.userIndex = u.userIndex
LEFT JOIN reply_mst r ON b.boardIndex = r.boardIndex
where boardSubject like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') where u.userNick like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') where boardContent like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') where( boardSubject like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or boardContent like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')) where boardVisit >= #{searchValue} where boardLikeCount >= #{searchValue} where 1=1
GROUP BY b.boardIndex, b.boardSubject, u.userId, b.boardRegDate,b.boardVisit, b.boardUploadName, b.boardUploadSize, b.boardUploadLocation order by boardIndex desc
limit #{index}, #{count}
